** 8 《泰伯篇第八》

8.2子曰：¶

則民不偷。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_008-3a>¶	KR1b0004_017:7b:2:25:6,KR1c0004_007:1b:8:30:2,KR1c0004_007:2a:5:12:2,KR1c0012_019:34a:3:20:0,KR1c0012_019:34a:5:7:0,KR1c0013_016:14a:3:19:0,KR1c0013_019:24b:8:6:0,KR1c0042_005:59b:1:28:2,KR1d0001_002:63a:47:1:62,KR1d0003_034:31b:7:6:1,KR1d0003_034:31b:8:35:1,KR1d0005_001:17b:6:6:2,KR1d0010_002:7b:5:16:1,KR1d0010_002:8a:1:20:1,KR1d0014_001:24b:8:19:1,KR1d0014_009:18b:5:12:1,KR1d0019_021:13a:1:16:3,KR1d0036_008:9a:1:15:4,KR1d0053_035:14a:1:20:1,KR1d0054_010:13a:8:18:1,KR1d0057_023:19a:8:3:0,KR1d0057_086:27b:8:8:0,KR1d0068_048:22b:1:13:11,KR1d0076_009:2b:7:6:2,KR1d0086_068:13a:5:16:30,KR1d0086_078:3b:3:1:0,KR1d0087_009:3a:4:8:2,KR1d0087_260:70a:8:28:70,KR1e0006_005:2b:1:13:1,KR1e0007_002:9a:5:38:1,KR1g0009_004:13b:2:3:3,KR1h0004_008:1a:14:1:1,KR1h0005_004:11b:5:6:0,KR1h0006_004:24b:9:6:40,KR1h0006_004:25a:7:23:40,KR1h0007_008:2b:1:3:6,KR1h0007_008:2b:7:10:6,KR1h0012_004:22b:7:15:76,KR1h0012_004:23a:8:4:77,KR1h0015_004:10b:8:8:6,KR1h0017_008:3a:9:20:12,KR1h0017_018:17b:3:15:54,KR1h0019_002:3b:3:15:9,KR1h0020_002:18a:1:15:95,KR1h0021_000:94a:7:15:411,KR1h0024_009:18a:7:10:6,KR1h0026_004:21a:3:15:82,KR1h0028_007:37b:10:15:103,KR1h0032_000:9a:14:15:97,KR1h0032_002:24a:5:19:50,KR1h0032_005:6a:1:15:9,KR1h0034_007:34b:10:15:106,KR1h0038_008:24a:8:15:104,KR1h0039_003:48b:3:15:249,KR1h0039_006:24a:3:9:51,KR1h0043_008:4b:7:15:9,KR1j0022_003:5a:5:18:10,KR2c0021_023:28b:6:1:3,KR2c0021_044:28a:6:10:1,KR2c0021_115:13a:2:3:1,KR2c0022_018:10a:5:13:2,KR2d0006_104:8b:3:12:13,KR2e0001_006:8b:7:10:0,KR2e0001_006:8b:8:6:0,KR2e0001_021:8b:7:7:72,KR2e0001_021:8b:8:9:72,KR2f0040_011:29a:7:19:8,KR2m0001_171:1b:2:19:2,KR2o0021_010:50b:8:20:155,KR3a0002_006:17a:6:20:1,KR3a0047_035:7b:2:6:4,KR3a0063_004:36b:2:21:1,KR3a0080_067:14a:3:16:114,KR3a0094_046:12a:2:17:1,KR3a0110_031:2b:2:3:24,KR3a0110_062:33a:7:7:425,KR3c0001_005:5b:1:174:4,KR3c0002_005:9a:8:2:3,KR3c0002_008:12a:4:12:3,KR3c0002_008:12a:4:38:3,KR3c0004_001:7a:2:14:5,KR3h0063_063:31b:1:9:484,KR3j0185_073: 小子！」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_008-4a>¶

8.4曾子有疾，¶

# src: LY 08.07; tr. CH
8.7曾子曰：¶
「士不可以不弘毅，¶	KR1h0004_008:1a:55:1:7,KR1h0005_004:13b:6:11:0,KR3j0082_008:13b:6:2:3,KR4d0137_002:17b:4:4:1,KR4e0157_004:31a:1:11:46,KR4e0245_012:23b:6:7:72,KR5h0033_008:028a:5:4:37,KR5i0078_007:07p008b:4:4:2,KR6d0098_001:0706b:2:4:289,KR6q0226_002:0296c:17:18:167

# src: LY 08.08; tr. CH
8.8子曰：¶
「興於《詩》，¶
立於禮，¶
成於樂。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_008-9a>¶

亂也。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_008-11a>¶

# src: LY 08.11; tr. CH
8.11子曰：¶

# src: LY 08.13:01; tr. CH
8.13子曰：¶

邦有道，¶

恥也；¶
邦無道，¶

恥也。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_008-14a>¶

不謀其政。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_008-15a>¶	KR1a0008_008:3a:5:20:1,KR1a0012_007:34b:1:12:5,KR1a0034_004:71a:3:14:0,KR1a0049_011:6a:3:2:2,KR1a0064_012:9a:3:1:1,KR1a0073_006:18a:6:14:1,KR1a0092_007:93b:3:14:10,KR1a0129_003:22b:5:5:1,KR1b0010_018:1b:3:4:0,KR1g0003_001:2a:5:3:6,KR1g0005_007:24b:8:5:160,KR1g0009_004:17b:1:7:3,KR1g0009_007:21b:5:7:3,KR1h0003_010:27b:3:42:21,KR1h0004_008:1a:97:1:15,KR1h0004_014:7a:155:1:32,KR1h0005_004:15b:3:8:0,KR1h0005_007:20b:3:2:0,KR1h0006_004:33a:4:7:51,KR1h0006_007:38a:6:7:53,KR1h0007_008:8a:8:7:17,KR1h0007_014:18b:8:7:25,KR1h0012_004:31b:1:7:102,KR1h0012_004:31b:5:16:103,KR1h0012_007:36b:8:7:103,KR1h0015_004:14b:2:6:6,KR1h0015_006:35a:7:7:13,KR1h0016_011:13b:2:10:18,KR1h0017_008:26b:7:7:91,KR1h0017_014:37a:1:7:152,KR1h0017_014:37a:3:7:153,KR1h0019_002:12a:4:7:32,KR1h0019_002:12a:6:8:33,KR1h0020_002:20b:4:7:113,KR1h0020_003:37b:6:14:163,KR1h0020_003:38b:11:7:169,KR1h0021_000:99b:5:7:434,KR1h0021_000:182a:5:7:809,KR1h0024_009:26a:5:10:6,KR1h0024_012:23b:6:8:6,KR1h0026_004:28a:5:7:108,KR1h0026_004:28a:7:12:109,KR1h0026_007:34a:8:7:111,KR1h0028_007:55a:8:7:137,KR1h0028_010:48b:3:7:183,KR1h0028_010:48b:10:13:186,KR1h0031_011:12b:7:21:27,KR1h0032_000:9b:12:5:101,KR1h0032_005:9b:9:5:18,KR1h0034_007:49b:4:7:139,KR1h0034_010:54a:3:34:175,KR1h0034_010:57b:3:7:186,KR1h0037_003:11b:4:7:31,KR1h0037_003:11b:8:5:32,KR1h0038_008:33a:8:7:137,KR1h0038_011:37a:3:7:190,KR1h0039_005:46b:9:5:153,KR1h0043_008:28a:5:7:42,KR1h0043_008:28a:9:1:43,KR1h0043_014:39a:5:7:78,KR2a0007_067:15b:1:2:2,KR2b0004_022:18b:6:16:4,KR2b0020_017:4a:2:29:18,KR2c0004_078:6a:5:19:3,KR2d0006_113:79b:5:13:6,KR2d0006_213:79a:7:15:3,KR2f0006_012:9a:6:15:13,KR2f0008_004:12a:4:11:99,KR2f0008_030:8a:7:15:45,KR2f0009_216:8b:5:20:77,KR2f0037_038:8a:7:13:24,KR2f0039_103:13b:8:4:2,KR2f0039_283:1a:6:10:2,KR2g0024_007:5b:6:17:4,KR2g0051_029:28b:7:7:7,KR2i0005_040:1b:5:10:1,KR2k0037_017:52b:5:15:16,KR2n0011_241:2a:8:3:4,KR2o0001_004:9b:1:7:4,KR2o0002_004:16a:6:7:5,KR2o0020_044:22a:6:9:62,KR2o0020_069 8.15子曰：¶

8.18子曰：¶
「巍巍乎，¶

# src: LY 08.20:01; tr. CH
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_008-20a>8.20舜有臣五人而天下治。¶
武王曰：¶

孔子曰：¶
「才難，¶

周之德，¶
其可謂至德也已矣。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_008-21a>¶	KR1a0065_003:39a:3:18:11,KR1b0040_015:45a:2:2:4,KR1b0055_001:23b:8:12:264,KR1c0041_009:38a:6:20:32,KR1h0004_008:1a:3:1:0,KR1h0004_008:20a:13:1:22,KR1h0007_008:1a:11:5:5,KR1h0007_008:10b:4:20:23,KR1h0007_008:11a:5:37:23,KR1h0015_004:15b:7:26:6,KR1h0017_008:1a:9:5:5,KR1h0017_008:2b:6:5:10,KR1h0017_008:33a:10:16:127,KR1h0021_000:102a:4:15:447,KR1h0024_009:17b:5:5:6,KR1h0024_009:27b:5:24:6,KR1h0028_007:35b:7:5:99,KR1h0028_007:59a:8:15:155,KR1h0032_000:9a:9:3:95,KR1h0032_000:10a:6:15:104,KR1h0034_007:32b:9:5:102,KR1h0034_007:53b:9:15:157,KR1h0035_001:33a:7:3:213,KR1h0043_008:1a:9:5:5,KR2b0004_013:13b:6:18:5,KR2k0050_055:4b:2:3:1,KR2o0015_006:6b:4:18:5,KR2o0015_010:2a:5:10:15,KR2o0015_014:3b:5:16:12,KR2o0021_005:15a:6:32:19,KR3a0059_034:113b:3:5:4,KR3j0185_003:66b:1:18:26,KR3k0003_021:13a:3:16:2,KR3k0012_423:6a:10:7:7,KR3k0012_999:6a:10:7:11403,KR3k0057_017:16a:3:23:227,KR3l0069_012:7a:3:18:0,KR4d0226_008:5b:1:5:4459,KR4d0226_050:5b:1:5:12,KR4d0279_007:5a:7:19:3,KR4f0021_009:5a:6:6:4,KR4h0022_760:19a:2:13:22,KR4h0106_029:1b:4:3:5,KR4h0115_140:1b:7:1:4,KR5c0104_003:001b:7:15:1,KR5h0033_008:069b:3:1:83,KR6e0012_019:0149a:23:7:48,KR6r0151_002:0803b:13:32:120

8.21子曰：¶
